products.Title: Apple TV 4K
products.Brief: The Apple experience. Cinematic in every sense.
products.Description: Enjoy Dolby Vision, HDR10+, and Dolby Atmos sound. SharePlay, Apple Arcade, Fitness+, and the Apple TV app bring unbeatable entertainment to your living room.

products.Title: HomePod
products.Description: Fill any room with rich, spatial audio. Control your smart home with Siri and create stereo pairs or multiroom sound that works seamlessly with Apple TV 4K.

products.Title: HomePod mini
products.Description: Place HomePod mini around your home for rich 360‑degree audio, Intercom announcements, and effortless smart home control.
